price: Wͻn akyiri no, anaamusifoͻ bi besii wͻn anan mu a wͻ’buu wͻn ani guu Nyamefrε no soͻ, na wͻ’dii akͻnnͻ deε akyi. (Saa nkorͻfoͻ no) behyia ͻsεeε.
arabic: ۞ فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ خَلۡفٌ أَضَاعُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَلۡقَوۡنَ غَيًّا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fakhalafa min baʿdihim khalfun aḍāʿū al-ṣalata wa-ittabaʿū al-shahawāti fasawfa yalqawna ghayyan
